name: Nike Sky Force
description: There is a defect on the right toe but nothing bad. The flash makes the white much brighter than in person. The heels have been worn down.

name: K-Swiss Tennis Shoe
description: The shoes are new without box (box may have shelf wear.)

name: Soap Shoes
description: These have had their fair share of grinds. The right shoe is missing the toe cap and has a deep crack running through the sole. They will fall apart if continued to be grinded, however they are still a cool collectors piece to put on a shelf. The insole has been replaced.

name: Dr. Martens
description: Vintage chunky sandals. Runs a little large to fit 7.5 - 8.

name: Reebok Kamikaze II Low
description: Exact model worn by Shawn Kemp in the 1996 NBA All Star Game.

name: British Knights Dymacel
description: Vintage. Does have some wear shown in pictures and sock lint. No box.
